channel.title: Critique one of my sites
channel.description:
This website [u]DOES[/u] belong to me. I coded this, and designed it from scratch, so don't post just to say "l0l nob u haf 2 giv all da crdit 2 the prson who rly made it l0lol0lo0olo0l."
Tell me what looks ugly and what looks nice, and rate it.
http://west.phsradio.com:81/
Here's a screenshot, but you can't see most of the stuff with just the screenshot.
[img]http://west.phsradio.com:81/screenshot.jpg[/img]

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

[quote=“Westside Rep, post:17, topic:234319”][quote author=N00b1 link=topic=308958.msg2476804#msg2476804 date=1223314442]
just wondering… im guessing you ain’t secured your DB? or scripts?

the java box wasn’t working, so i went to your “login box” tried a simple sql injection and boom im in :s

men’t to happen?
[/quote]

I’m pretty sure I sanitized all of the inputs. Tell me what you entered.[/quote]
with out the ‘’
’ OR 1=1 #’ pretty basic… meh

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

On another topic

[me=magma]waits to hear mysql hax[/me]

I don’t really care actually, it’s just a Development Mirror. All I have to do is unload the real one and load it into the development database.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:234665”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=308958.msg2470692#msg2470692 date=1222978528]
@magma, why would users want to move the divs around? It’d be a pretty pointless add-on…
[/quote]
meh it was just an idea to make the page a bit better. Why do we have one on the mitb homepage? :P[/quote]Because it almost half-way makes sense to have one on MITB. It makes no sense to have it on this server.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Westside Rep, post:13, topic:234319”]Having someone request a song that might not even exist, besides the exception of the one that’s a 1GB Null mp3, or the one that will open a webpage for you (Completely possible).

Where are you going to find a trusted source for fully legal music (music that modern day 15 - 18 year olds might listen to) for free?

There isn’t one. Unless you want the RIAA to fuck with you.[/quote]l2serverside checks.

And just because you request a song does not mean you have to play it.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:12, topic:234319”]If you’re new, it’d pose a security risk.

And it’d totally be worth-while. It’s hard finding someone who will stay up 24/# to DJ for you lulz; even a group of people.[/quote]

Having someone request a song that might not even exist, besides the exception of the one that’s a 1GB Null mp3, or the one that will open a webpage for you (Completely possible).

Where are you going to find a trusted source for fully legal music (music that modern day 15 - 18 year olds might listen to) for free?

There isn’t one. Unless you want the RIAA to fuck with you.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Westside Rep, post:11, topic:234319”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=308958.msg2470967#msg2470967 date=1222988538]

[quote]If there’s no music playing, and instead there’s just a robot playing pre-selected music, who would want to listen?
You wouldn’t be able to request music…[/quote]
You’d be amazed how well computers work nowadays.
[/quote]

I am fully aware of it, but adding a request feature to an Auto - DJ would not only be not worthwhile, but it would pose as a security risk.[/quote]If you’re new, it’d pose a security risk.

And it’d totally be worth-while. It’s hard finding someone who will stay up 24/# to DJ for you lulz; even a group of people.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:10, topic:234319”][quote]If there’s no music playing, and instead there’s just a robot playing pre-selected music, who would want to listen?
You wouldn’t be able to request music…[/quote]
You’d be amazed how well computers work nowadays.[/quote]

I am fully aware of it, but adding a request feature to an Auto - DJ would not only be not worthwhile, but it would pose as a security risk.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

If there's no music playing, and instead there's just a robot playing pre-selected music, who would want to listen? You wouldn't be able to request music...
You'd be amazed how well computers work nowadays.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

On another topic

It’s not that complicated, I used to run a radio server and it ran through tracks when there were no DJ slots open.

But you probably payed for the server to be hosted for you. A lot of [professional] Internet Radio server hosts have an “Auto DJ” feature, which isn’t needed for me. If there’s no music playing, and instead there’s just a robot playing pre-selected music, who would want to listen?
You wouldn’t be able to request music…

Anyways, I agree, the background image is ugly. I’ll change that when I get around to it.
I’m going to make a Logo, stick it in a banner, stick it to the top of the web page, and then add some updates to the CSS blablalblaba…

@Holic
This site is for my High School, so I’m using their school colors (Gold and black), as for the textboxes and inputs, I was just experimenting with different colors.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Background is… bleh.

Everything else is good… @magma, why would users want to move the divs around? It’d be a pretty pointless add-on…

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Westside Rep, post:3, topic:234319”][quote author=magma link=topic=308958.msg2469318#msg2469318 date=1222896251]

And everything was “Dead” because, there’s no one DJing on the radio atm, and my IRC server isn’t up yet.

Yeah I know, but you should still make it look active even when nobody is there with free-playing music or something.
[/quote]
That’s more complicated to do than you might think.

Unless there’s some software that let’s you do just that.
Otherwise someone would have to study all the packets being sent to the server when they’re DJing.
Then incorporate that into a program to automatically play a random song when there’s no DJ. it would take a while to make, and it’s not worth it. For me at least.[/quote]Or you can just test the connection to the ‘DJ’… Then play music from there.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:4, topic:234319”]PHS Radio - Giving you an eargasm.
That’s so gay [not that there’s anything wrong with being gay…].
Also, it’s “Criticize one of my sites”.[/quote]
Critique means review, criticize means to judge.
Also how is that gay?

The site’s background is terrible, and the colours are too boring. The textboxes should make the scheme.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Colinsmiley Colinsmiley
item.description:
@Colinsmiley wrote:

I don’t like the design, Its ugly in my opinion…

Sorry for being harsh but tbh its horrid.

Read full topic

PHS Radio - Giving you an eargasm.

That’s so gay [not that there’s anything wrong with being gay…].

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:234329”][quote author=Westside Rep link=topic=308958.msg2469300#msg2469300 date=1222895108]
And everything was “Dead” because, there’s no one DJing on the radio atm, and my IRC server isn’t up yet.
[/quote]
Yeah I know, but you should still make it look active even when nobody is there with free-playing music or something.[/quote]
That’s more complicated to do than you might think.

Unless there’s some software that let’s you do just that.
Otherwise someone would have to study all the packets being sent to the server when they’re DJing.
Then incorporate that into a program to automatically play a random song when there’s no DJ. it would take a while to make, and it’s not worth it. For me at least.

Read full topic

item.title: Critique one of my sites
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:234325”]The background is ugly (all the bars 'n shit) but the general theme is okay really. You should make the window boxes moveable using absolute divs and js.

I also didn’t like the fact that when I loaded the page everything seemed dead: Offline, Offline, Offline, Unable to connect : java.net.ConnectException etc…[/quote]

I agree, the background is a bit shitty, and no, the boxes are fine being stationary.

And everything was “Dead” because, there’s no one DJing on the radio atm, and my IRC server isn’t up yet.

Read full topic
